item.title: Help with new buttons
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

Well im trying to add the new buttons to my client, the rs ones.

I have the code but im not sure where to put it.

smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Report Abuse", 158, 461); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Report Abuse", 157, 460); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "All", 159, 33); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "All", 158, 32); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Game", 159, 91); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Game", 158, 90); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Public", 154, 148); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Public", 153, 147); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Private", 154, 205); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Private", 153, 204); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Trade", 154, 262); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Trade", 153, 261); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Duel", 154, 318); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Duel", 153, 317); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor2[publicChatMode], PChat[publicChatMode], 165, 147); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor[publicChatMode], PChat[publicChatMode], 164, 146); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor2[privateChatMode], PChat[privateChatMode], 165, 204); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor[privateChatMode], PChat[privateChatMode], 164, 203); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor2[tradeMode], PChat[tradeMode], 165, 261);//319 smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor[tradeMode], PChat[tradeMode], 164, 260); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor2[duelMode], PChat[duelMode], 165, 318); smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor[duelMode], PChat[duelMode], 164, 317);
any help?
